snippet: An explosion on Tuesday at a house in Beit Hanoun, a town in the northern Gaza Strip, killed three people and wounded at least seven others, the Gaza Ministry of Health said.
abstract: Explosion at house in Beit Hanoun, town in northern Gaza Strip, kills three people and wounds at least seven others.
lead_paragraph: An explosion on Tuesday at a house in Beit Hanoun, a town in the northern Gaza Strip, killed three people and wounded at least seven others, the Gaza Ministry of Health said.

headline.main: Gaza: Explosives in a House Kill 3
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Explosives in a House Kill 3
